name: Mycobacteria_Infection_NonTB_ExPulmTestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesNucleicAcidInExtrapulmonarySpecimen
title: Mycobacteria_Infection_NonTB_ExPulm (Tests for Mycobacterium species Nucleic Acid in Extrapulmonary Specimen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Extrapulmonary Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection identified by Nucleic Acid testing.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: mycobacterium species nucleic),(Exclusion Criteria: -culture -isolate -complex -respiratory -sputum -bronchoalveolar -bronchial -stool)
